title: Cant install symphony without XAMPP, using cmd?
body:
Hello i am completely newbie, i am on intern right now and i need to install symfony. but when i write this in cmd:

php -r "readfile('https://symfony.com/installer');" > symfony

i get this error:

php is not recognized as an internal or external command

I dont have xampp on this computer and i can't set environment variables with path to xampp. And i don't know how to install it.

If i need to write PHP code, i connect Net Beans with the server of company.
